Epicater

The best hand selected food providers delivered effortlessly to your office

catering and event services

Epic. Effortless. Catering.

Epic. Effortless. Catering.

We provide quality, consulting and concierge service at every stage of the process. From the first order to feedback after your meals are delivered.

Whether it's lunch for 30 people, a team breakfast, or a large scale event. Epicater guarantees great food and service starting with 3 easy steps.

Processes

Meal Plans

  1. Consult

    Your catering concierge will work with you in creating the ultimate meal plan. They'll tailor a program that seamlessly matches your team's preference.

  2. Enjoy

    We'll take care of the whole delivery process. All you have to do is show up hungry.

  3. Review

    Through our simple review process, we'll learn what your team loves and schedule it more often. New vendors will be sourced and added to your playlist based on the feedback we receive.

Events

  1. Consult

    Speak with one of our experts to select the perfect fair and libations for your event. Looking for the right decor, equipment rentals and entertainment too? We've got you covered.

  2. Deliver

    It's the small things that make all the difference. We'll plate all the fair, set up the bar and provide the wait staff necessary to make your event a success.

  3. Enjoy

    We'll take care of all the logistics to ensure your guests are well fed and entertained so you can sit back and enjoy the event.

Benefits

We Make Catering Easy

Why go through the trail and error of sourcing great meals or menus when we've already done that for you? Epicater is far from your average catering company.
